backend.main module

async backend.main.http_exception_handler(request: Request, exc: HTTPException)[source]

Global exception handler for Starlette HTTPExceptions.

Logs the exception and returns a JSON response with the error detail.

Parameters:

  • request (fastapi.Request) – The FastAPI request object.

  • exc (starlette.exceptions.HTTPException) – The Starlette HTTPException instance.

Returns:

A JSON response with the error detail.

Return type:

fastapi.responses.JSONResponse

async backend.main.validation_exception_handler(request: Request, exc: RequestValidationError)[source]

Global exception handler for FastAPI RequestValidationErrors.

Logs the validation errors and returns a JSON response with the error details.

Parameters:

  • request (fastapi.Request) – The FastAPI request object.

  • exc (fastapi.exceptions.RequestValidationError) – The RequestValidationError instance.

Returns:

A JSON response with the validation error details.

Return type:

fastapi.responses.JSONResponse

backend.main.read_root()[source]

Root endpoint for the API.

Returns a simple “Ping”: “Pong” message to indicate the API is running.

Returns:

A dictionary with “Ping”: “Pong”.

Return type:

dict

async backend.main.authorize_airtable_integration(user_id: str = Form(Ellipsis), org_id: str = Form(Ellipsis))[source]

Endpoint to initiate Airtable OAuth2 authorization.

Parameters:

  • user_id (str) – The ID of the user.

  • org_id (str) – The ID of the organization.

Returns:

The authorization URL for Airtable.

Return type:

str

async backend.main.oauth2callback_airtable_integration(request: Request)[source]

Endpoint for Airtable OAuth2 callback.

Handles the redirection from Airtable after user authorization.

Parameters:

request (fastapi.Request) – The FastAPI request object.

Returns:

An HTML response to close the window.

Return type:

fastapi.responses.HTMLResponse

async backend.main.get_airtable_credentials_integration(user_id: str = Form(Ellipsis), org_id: str = Form(Ellipsis))[source]

Endpoint to retrieve Airtable credentials.

Parameters:

  • user_id (str) – The ID of the user.

  • org_id (str) – The ID of the organization.

Returns:

Airtable credentials.

Return type:

dict

async backend.main.get_airtable_items(credentials: str = Form(Ellipsis))[source]

Endpoint to load items from Airtable using provided credentials.

Parameters:

credentials (str) – JSON string of Airtable credentials.

Returns:

A list of Airtable items (bases and tables).

Return type:

list[dict]
